definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The Regulation of Anti-Monopoly Law for the Abuse of Patent Right;
sentences.chinese: 限制專利權濫用制度，是專利法中的重要內容。

sentences.english: It came to a head recently over drug patent laws.
sentences.chinese: 最近尤爲突出的，是在藥品專利法上。

sentences.english: But what you and I might consider an improvement, a patent lawyer might consider infringement.
sentences.chinese: 但是你我認爲是進步的事情，可能被專利法判爲侵權。
